item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260122)
item.description:
What's New

fix: Multiple Vietnamese input engine fixes and Adobe Illustrator compatibility

  • Bypass key repeat events to fix spring-loaded tools in Adobe Illustrator

(holding Z for Zoom, Space for Hand tool no longer causes lag/stuck cursor)

  • Prevent tone mark from moving on invalid vowel sequences (e.g., "ưoi" + tone)
  • Prevent circumflex from being added on invalid vowel sequences
  • Add context-aware macro standalone detection via Accessibility API
  • Add macro import/export functionality with JSON format support
